name: True Strength: The Tale Of Kenji (Kinetic Visual Novel)
name_original: True Strength: The Tale Of Kenji (Kinetic Visual Novel)
description:
This is the story of a boy with a tortured past. Banished to another planet Kenji searches for meaning , for a reason....for true strength. He meets others along the way....makes friends....enemies....how will he deal with these things? This is the Tale of Kenji.

And its my first visual novel by the way all the characters were hand drawn but the ones im doing now and in the future will all be digital but the story is still great and i was originally gonna make this into an anime soooo.....Um Im rambling now enjoy the visual novel!
